overview: Based on Samuel R. Delany’s short novel ‘Aye, and Gomorrah...’, where  the  sci-fi  premise  of  radiation-resistant  state-neutered  space travellers allows the author to explore androgyny, sexual identity,  etc.  Hammel  uses  Delany’s  story  to  create  a  spookily  beautiful world where asexual bodies live in the contradiction between  their  unarousable  loneliness  and  desire  for  intimacy  and contact.
title: Black Sun
